mapper.select: select * from admin where admin_id = #{admin_id} and admin_passwd = #{admin_passwd}
mapper.insert: insert into admin(admin_id, admin_passwd, admin_position, admin_title, admin_name) values(#{admin_id},#{admin_passwd},#{admin_position},#{admin_title},#{admin_name})
mapper.update: update admin set admin_passwd=#{admin_passwd}, admin_position=#{admin_position}, admin_title=#{admin_title} where admin_no = #{admin_no}
